bio: I am a software engineer passionate about scalable backend systems and high-performance applications. Currently, I am a Backend Intern â€“ Platform Engineering @ FamPay focusing on cloud infrastructure and backend migrations.
I am pursuing my B.Sc in Computer Science at BITS Pilani, and spend my time building CI/CD pipelines, distributed architectures, and AI-powered hardware prototypes like NeroSpatial.
